lead_paragraph: As Phil Mickelson and Padraig Harrington engaged in their version of the Ryder Cup on Saturday, Rich Beem was doing odd things at Riviera Country Club’s 14th hole.
snippet: As Phil Mickelson and Padraig Harrington engaged in their version of the Ryder Cup on Saturday, Rich Beem was doing odd things at Riviera Country Club’s 14th hole.
